_meanings:
‘Inferior knowledge’, a
class of writings subordinate to the
Vedas. There are four such  
{%Upavedas%}, one being attached to each of
the four Vedas:--thus {#Ayurveda#} or
Medicine to {#fgveda#}; (according to
some authorities such as Suśruta
it is a part of the Atharvaveda);
{#Danurveda#} or military science to {#yajurveda#};
{#gAMDarvaveda#} or Music to {#sAmaveda#}, and  
{#sTApatya-SastraM-veda#} or Mechanics to {#aTarvaveda#}.
